## Bio

Dustin studied social science and statistics and found his way in to the data science field after working in plant genetics for a little while. He considers himself a problem-solving enthusiast and a pro debugger. He may be a little old-fashioned, but he still believe we can make the world a better place through a gentle application of curiosity and a humble respect for the truth.
